results.title: Finding That Hudson Valley Gem for About $500,000: Which House Would You Choose?
results.abstract: While other upstate buyers were squaring off in bidding wars, one couple looked for an ‘ugly duckling’ in the hamlet of Kerhonkson to make their own. Here’s what they found.

media.caption: Jill and Henry Burk in Kerhonkson, N.Y., an Ulster County hamlet where they hoped to find a country house. “We were always drawn to ugly-duckling houses,” Ms. Burk said. “We want the house that no one else wants.”
